name: movies-app
description: Final Project: Movies     1. Create new Express app with EJS template     2. Create Mongoose connection and Movie model with attributes for name, description, year, genres, rating. You are allowed to add one more field of your choice     3. Create router to store routes in movies.js     4. Create form to collect data for movie and render errors     5. Create route for add movie ,Validate user input, and returns errors     6. Create route with param of id and form to display movie details     7. Create route with param of id and form to edit movie details     8. Create route and form with error validation for registration     9. Create route and form with error validation for login     10. Create route for logout     11. Restrict access to add movie to logged in users     12. Restrict access to edit/delete movie to users who posted/added movie     13. Deploy application to Heroku and submit all details, code , browser screenshot in blackboard     14. Choose the design/layout of your choice
